channel.title: Monster drops and rights
channel.description:
ye, so soz bout all the upcomimng questions heh... ive tried scanning the forums and looking into as many questions as possible.
Anyways...
How do i change what items are in the shops, what monsters drop and like peoples rights (is 1=member, 2=mod, 3=admin and 4=owner?... also when i edit some of the items in notepad theyve got codes like 1432 thats the number of the item? does someone have a list in which i can see this list so i can put the right things into it?
Thanks.

item.title: Monster drops and rights
item.dc:creator: @icevfire icevfire
item.description:
@icevfire wrote:

tyvm got it now xD

Read full topic

item.title: Monster drops and rights
item.dc:creator: @dynamic11 dynamic11
item.description:
@dynamic11 wrote:

for rights go into characters click on the character you want to make w/e and look for rights and change the 0 to whatever
1=mod
2=admin
3=owner
4=hidden admin

Read full topic

item.title: Monster drops and rights
item.dc:creator: @D_R_U_G D R U G
item.description:
@D_R_U_G wrote:

  1. go to your cfg files which are in config. or “cfg” look for shops and it should list the shop name,item ids then amount

  2. depending on what server its 1-mod 2-admin 3-owner 4-hidden owner(no crown)

EDIT:

  1. the last question didn’t make sence to me

Read full topic
